Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute at 47th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 47 47th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 47th, Archer, Pulaski and 47th due to street blockage near 47th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Archer, Pulaski and 47th due to street blockage near 47th/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Cermak.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
